DOC.criteria: Must general good health Fitzpatrick Skin Type IVI Able list current medication medical condition Capable give informed consent Women pregnant , nursing , may become pregnant next 3 month Participants take illegal drug Currently take ketoconazole , colestipol , cholestyramine , phenobarbitol , phenytoin , mineral oil Currently consume 800IU vitamin D day Subjects whose BMI > 40
